  • Method Details

    • addPrescription

      void addPrescription(Integer appointmentId, PrescriptionDTO prescriptionDTO) throws InvalidStateException, EntityNotFoundException
      Add a prescription for a patient following a consultation.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the id of the appointment after which the prescription is given
      prescriptionDTO - the details of the prescription
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if the appointment is not yet completed, in which case no prescriptions can be given
      EntityNotFoundException

    • findByAppointmentId

      Optional<PrescriptionDTO> findByAppointmentId(Integer appointmentId) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Get a prescription based on the appointment to which it was added. There is a 1-to-1 relationship between appointments and prescriptions, and they share the same id.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the id of the appointment which is the same as the id of the prescription
      Returns:
      the prescription if it was found, wrapped in an optional or an empty optional
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no appointment exists with the given id

    • findByPatientName

      List<PrescriptionDTO> findByPatientName(String firstName, String lastName) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Get the prescriptions assigned for a given patient based on its name.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the patient
      lastName - the last name of the patient
      Returns:
      the list of prescriptions of the given patient
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no patient was found by the given name

    • findByPatientId

      List<PrescriptionDTO> findByPatientId(Integer id) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Get the prescriptions assigned for a given patient based on its id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the patient
      Returns:
      the list of prescriptions of the given patient
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no patient was found by the given id

    • exportPrescription

      void exportPrescription(Integer appointmentId) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Export a prescription, by saving it as a pdf.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the id of the appointment for which the prescription was made
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no appointment exists with the given id
